resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/36825</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>36825</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
    <entry>merli/497</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/497</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/497</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Editor de comarques</string>
            <string language="en">County map editor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grafschaftkarte Herausgeber</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éditeur de carte du comté</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Editor do mapa do condado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Editore del programma della contea</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επεξεργαστής χαρτών νομών</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Aplicació per elaborar i editar mapes de Catalunya, per comarques i de cada comarca, a partir d'una base amb colors en què es poden anar afegint símbols referits a temes diversos (natura, economia, història...), etiquetes de text, la rosa dels vents, text, etc.</string>
            <string language="en">Application for drawing and editing maps of the counties of Catalonia, together or individually. Icons on different subjects (nature, economy, history, etc.) can be added, as well as labels, the compass points, text, etc.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">cartografia</string>
            <string language="en">cartography</string>
            <string language="es">cartografía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">geografia</string>
            <string language="en">geography</string>
            <string language="es">geografía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">geografia regional</string>
            <string language="en">regional geography</string>
            <string language="es">geografía regional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">Espanya</string>
            <string language="en">Spain</string>
            <string language="es">España</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anwendung für das Zeichnen und das Bearbeiten der
Karten der Grafschaften von Katalonien, zusammen oder einzeln. 
Ikonen auf unterschiedlichen Themen (Natur, Wirtschaft, 
Geschichte, usw..) kann, sowie Kennsätze, die 
Himmelsrichtungen, Text, usw. hinzugefügt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Demande de dessiner et d'éditer des cartes des 
comtés de la Catalogne, ensemble ou individuellement. 
Graphismes sur les différents sujets (nature, économie, 
histoire, etc...) peut être ajouté, aussi bien que des 
étiquettes, les points de boussole, le texte, etc...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aplicação para desenhar e editar mapas dos 
condados de Catalonia, junto ou individualmente. Ícones nos 
assuntos diferentes (natureza, economia, history, etc..) pode 
ser adicionado, as.well.as etiquetas, os pontos de compasso, o texto, 
etc..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda di disegnare e stampa dei mappe delle 
contee della Catalogna, insieme o individualmente. Icone sugli 
oggetti differenti (natura, economia, storia, ecc.) può essere 
aggiunto, così come le etichette, i punti di bussola, il testo, ecc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εφαρμογή για τη σχεδίαση και να επιμεληθεί των χαρτών 
των νομών της Καταλωνίας, μαζί ή χωριστά. Εικονίδια στα 
διαφορετικά θέματα (φύση, οικονομία, ιστορία, κ.λπ....) 
μπορέστε να προστεθείτε, καθώς επίσης και ετικέτες, τα 
σημεία πυξίδων, το κείμενο, κ.λπ....</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Cartography</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">regionale Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spanien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cartographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géographie régionale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Espagne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cartography</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geografia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geografia regional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Spain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cartografia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">geografia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">geografia regionale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Spagna</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χαρτογραφία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωγραφία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιφερειακή γεωγραφία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ισπανία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
